decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to create a fast-paced aggressive strategy that focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing a combination of hand disruption, counter spells, and removal, the deck aims to control the tempo of the game and maintain a strong board presence to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes powerful threats such as Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Nethergoyf to close out games quickly. Additionally, the mana base is designed to ensure consistency and support the deck's aggressive gameplay.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently fill up the graveyard with combo pieces such as Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer, allowing for an explosive win condition with cards like Dread Return or Thassa's Oracle. The deck aims to use fast mana sources like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual to power out its combo pieces, while also having disruption and protection in the form of Pact of Negation and Cabal Therapy. The deck is designed to win the game in one explosive turn, catching opponents off guard and securing a quick victory.

The deck focuses on a control strategy using a combination of disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will, as well as removal spells like Swords to Plowshares. It also includes card advantage generators like Brainstorm and Ponder to dig for answers. The deck utilizes Leyline Binding to lock down opponent's threats while ramping with Up the Beanstalk. The presence of powerful threats like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Murktide Regent allows the deck to switch gears and close out games quickly if needed.	Endurance provides graveyard hate and protection against combo decks.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly play a series of zero-cost spells and combo pieces to mill your entire deck and win the game on the same turn. By using cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer to put your entire library into the graveyard, you can then use Dread Return to bring back Thassa's Oracle and win the game with its enter the battlefield ability. The deck focuses on speed and efficiency to overwhelm your opponent before they have a chance to respond.

The deck aims to quickly and efficiently combo off by milling its entire library into the graveyard and then using Thassa's Oracle to win the game. It utilizes a variety of fast mana sources and rituals to quickly power out its combo pieces, while also including disruption in the form of Thoughtseize and Pact of Negation to protect its combo. The deck also includes ways to reanimate key combo pieces and dig for missing combo pieces. The goal is to win the game before the opponent has a chance to interact or disrupt the combo.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize low-cost spells and creatures to control the board and apply pressure on the opponent quickly. By using cards like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent alongside counterspells like Daze and Force of Will, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a strong offense. The mana base is built to support the deck's aggressive playstyle, with Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base and fetchlands for consistency. This deck is designed to be fast, efficient, and versatile in Legacy 1 vs 1 gameplay.

The deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures and disruptive elements to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan. It seeks to ramp up with mana dorks like Noble Hierarch and Birds of Paradise to quickly cast threats like Knight of the Reliquary and Questing Beast. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Collector Ouphe to slow down the opponent's plays. With access to Green Sun's Zenith and a toolbox of creatures, the deck can adapt to different matchups and disrupt the opponent's strategy while applying a fast clock.

This deck focuses on using cards like Nomads en-Kor and Nadu, Winged Wisdom to combo off and generate a lot of card advantage and mana. It also includes cards like Swords to Plowshares and Force of Will for removal and protection, as well as Ponder and Brainstorm for card selection. The deck can quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence. The inclusion of Teferi, Time Raveler and Leovold, Emissary of Trest helps to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy.
